languages.text: Старец живописует о длинной и полной опасных приключений дороге, приведшей его к обладанию данными документами, а затем с гордостью предъявляет их вам. Как ни поразительно, но бумаги оказываются настоящими.

The old man describes a long journey full of perilous adventures that eventually brought him into possession of the documents, which he then proudly presents to you. Astonishingly enough, the papers turn out to be genuine.
languages.original_text: Старец живописует о длинной и полной опасных приключений дороге, приведшей его к обладанию данными документами, а затем с гордостью предъявляет их вам. Как ни поразительно, но бумаги оказываются настоящими.

traits.locale_text: The old man spins a tale of a long journey full of perilous adventures that eventually brought him into possession of those documents, which he then proudly presents to you. Astonishingly enough, the papers turn out to be genuine.

The old man describes a long journey full of perilous adventures that eventually brought him into possession of the documents, which he then proudly presents to you. Astonishingly enough, the papers turn out to be genuine.

languages.text: El anciano describe un largo viaje lleno de aventuras peligrosas que acabó permitiéndole obtener los documentos, que te presenta con orgullo. Sorprendentemente, son auténticos.
languages.original_text: The old man describes a long journey full of perilous adventures that eventually brought him into possession of the documents, which he then proudly presents to you. Astonishingly enough, the papers turn out to be genuine.

traits.locale_text: El anciano describe un largo viaje lleno de aventuras peligrosas que acabó permitiéndole obtener los documentos, que te presenta con orgullo. Sorprendentemente, son auténticos.

languages.text: その老人は、危険な冒険に溢れる長い旅の話を語り、最後には書類を手に入れたと言って、それを誇らしげにこちらへ差し出した。なんと、この書類は本物ではないか。
languages.original_text: The old man describes a long journey full of perilous adventures that eventually brought him into possession of the documents, which he then proudly presents to you. Astonishingly enough, the papers turn out to be genuine.

traits.locale_text: その老人は、危険な冒険に溢れる長い旅の話を語り、最後には書類を手に入れたと言って、それを誇らしげにこちらへ差し出した。なんと、この書類は本物ではないか。

languages.text: 老人描述了这场危机四伏的漫长冒险，以及最终拿到文件的过程。随后，他自豪地向你展示了这些文件。令你惊讶的是，这些文件竟然都是真的。
languages.original_text: The old man describes a long journey full of perilous adventures that eventually brought him into possession of the documents, which he then proudly presents to you. Astonishingly enough, the papers turn out to be genuine.

traits.locale_text: 老人描述了这场危机四伏的漫长冒险，以及最终拿到文件的过程。随后，他自豪地向你展示了这些文件。令你惊讶的是，这些文件竟然都是真的。

languages.text: Der alte Mann beschreibt eine lange Reise voller gefährlicher Abenteuer, durch die er schließlich in Besitz der Dokumente gekommen ist, die er dir nun stolz präsentiert. Überraschenderweise erweisen sich die Unterlagen tatsächlich als echt.
languages.original_text: The old man describes a long journey full of perilous adventures that eventually brought him into possession of the documents, which he then proudly presents to you. Astonishingly enough, the papers turn out to be genuine.

traits.locale_text: Der alte Mann beschreibt eine lange Reise voller gefährlicher Abenteuer, durch die er schließlich in Besitz der Dokumente gekommen ist, die er dir nun stolz präsentiert. Überraschenderweise erweisen sich die Unterlagen tatsächlich als echt.

languages.text: Le vieil homme raconte avoir réussi à mettre la main sur les documents après un long et périlleux périple, et vous les présente avec fierté. Étonnamment, ils s'avèrent authentiques.
languages.original_text: The old man describes a long journey full of perilous adventures that eventually brought him into possession of the documents, which he then proudly presents to you. Astonishingly enough, the papers turn out to be genuine.

traits.locale_text: Le vieil homme raconte avoir réussi à mettre la main sur les documents après un long et périlleux périple, et vous les présente avec fierté. Étonnamment, ils s'avèrent authentiques.

languages.text: İhtiyar adam; tehlikeli maceralarla dolu, uzun bir yolculuğu tasvir ediyor. Bu yolculuk sayesinde en nihayetinde eline geçirdiği belgeleri şimdi gururla sana sunuyor. Şaşırtıcı bir şekilde bu belgelerin hakiki olduğu ortaya çıkıyor.
languages.original_text: The old man describes a long journey full of perilous adventures that eventually brought him into possession of the documents, which he then proudly presents to you. Astonishingly enough, the papers turn out to be genuine.
